description: Core terminology for Arka OS and HCM

entries.definition: A structured engagement with defined objectives, tasks, and deliverables tracked within Arka OS. Governed by a MISSION_CONTRACT.
An immutable data envelope containing structured payload and metadata. 17 pack types exist in Arka taxonomy.
The versioned source of truth for mission governance. Stored as MISSION_CONTRACT pack type.
Structured proof or supporting material for a decision, analysis, or finding. Stored with integrity hash.
A structured collection of evidence items that collectively support a decision or analysis.
An AI-powered autonomous entity within Arka OS, capable of reading HCM, performing tasks, and updating state.
Hybrid Collective Memory - the structured knowledge and state repository shared between humans and AI agents.
Hybrid Index - the governance layer for HCM search, defining classification, scopes, and routing rules.
An append-only log of timestamped entries documenting mission progress and events.
A point-in-time capture of mission state, used for audit, rollback, and continuity.
